taxid.description: NCBI taxon identifier for the genus

commonName.description: The common name for this genus (typically the common name of the main species)

species.description: A list of species available for this genus.

resources.description: A list of resources available for this genus, each entry containing name, URL and description.

items.title: Resource entry
items.description: A resource entry, containing name, URL, and description.

name.description: a name given to this resource

URL.description: the URL pointing to this resource
